idea-plugin.name: I18n-Extractor
idea-plugin.description:
Vue Chinese i18n Extractor
This plugin helps developers quickly internationalize hard-coded Chinese strings in Vue Single File Components (.vue):
- Scans template text nodes, attributes (including slot name), script string literals and concatenations - Replaces Chinese with standard Vue i18n calls: {{ $t('key') }} in templates or $t('key') in JS - Automatically uses dynamic binding :name="$t('key')" for slot name attributes - Uses original Chinese (or lightly cleaned) as key, supports idempotency (skips already internationalized text) - All changes wrapped in WriteCommandAction – fully supports undo (Ctrl+Z) - Collects extracted strings in a map for later export to JSON or locale files
Significantly improves i18n workflow in Vue projects and reduces manual work.

action.description: 提取 Vue React文件中的中文，替换为 $t() 并生成 JSON
